system.weapons:
Turret: Multiple Rocket Launcher (4000m; S/2/4; Clip 4; Indirect (4)), Loaded with one of: 4x Manticore Missile, 4x Storm Eagle Missile, or 4x Sky Eagle Missile

Hull, one of: Front Facing Heavy Bolter, Heavy Flamer

Pintle (Optional), one of: Heavy Stubber, Storm Bolter

---

Heavy Bolter (150m, -/-/6, 1d10+8 X, Pen 5, Clip 60, Rld Full, Tearing)

Heavy Flamer (30m, S/-/-, 1d10+5 E, Pen 4, Clip 20, Rld 2 Full, Flame, Spray)

Heavy Stubber(100m, -/-/8, 1d10+4 I, Pen 3, Clip 80, Rld 2 Full)

Storm Bolter(90m, S/2/4, 1d10+4, Pen 4, Clip 60, Rld Full, Storm, Tearing)

Manticore Missile (4d10+12 X Damage, Pen 12, Blast(15+1d10), Concussive(5))

Storm Eagle Missile (6d10 X Damage, Pen 4, Blast(10), Concussive(6)),

- scatter 1d5 hits 2d10 metres from hit location

Sky Eagle Missile (4d10+12 X Damage, Pen 12, Proven (4)),

- can't fire indirect, -30 if used vs ground targets, gain Anti-Air (Advanced)
system.specialRules:
Trait: Enclosed, Tracked Vehicle, Anti-Air (Advanced) (only if using Sky Eagle Rocket)

Special Rules: Can only use one type of missile for all four rockets. Loading a rocket into the manticore requires a separate vehicle to lift them, such as a Trojan Support Vehicle. Each Rocket takes 3 Minutes to load/unload. If the Manticore jams on firing, all remaining rockets must be removed before being replaced.
system.traitsText:
Trait: Enclosed, Tracked Vehicle, Anti-Air (Advanced) (only if using Sky Eagle Rocket)
Special Rules: Can only use one type of missile for all four rockets. Loading a rocket into the manticore requires a separate vehicle to lift them, such as a Trojan Support Vehicle. Each Rocket takes 3 Minutes to load/unload. If the Manticore jams on firing, all remaining rockets must be removed before being replaced.
